availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Reuben Samuel Peters (Washington County, Kentucky, county court clerk)

body.p: Washington County, Kentucky, court clerk. Kentucky native. Married to Nancie Patton Peters in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on October 6, 1857. Deputy clerk in Marion County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned seven enslaved persons in Marion County in 1850. County court clerk in Washington County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Washington County in 1860. County court clerk in Washington County in 1862. County court clerk in Washington County in 1863. County court clerk in Washington County in 1865.
